short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set the background on a new tab to the city of the day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See beautiful image taken from Unsplash from cities all around the world every time you open a new tab. Images are refreshed every 1 hour. Besides the city, single sentence info is displayed about the city as well as the current weather on top right corner.
